rules_text: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Create a 1/1 white Human creature token and an Estus token. [i](It's an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Gwyndolin and Kingseeker Frampt waited for the chosen Undead to leave Undead Asylum.[/i]
